params._floor: The floor above which the reserve [pool] balance for that token is to be kept [in wei]
params._rate: The rate at which that token is to be tapped [in wei / block]
params._token: The address of the token to be tapped

allowRecoverability(address).details: By default deriving from AragonApp makes it recoverable

params.token: Token address that would be recovered

allowRecoverability(address).return: bool whether the app allows the recovery

canPerform(address,bytes32,uint256[]).details: Check whether an action can be performed by a sender for a particular role on this app
canPerform(address,bytes32,uint256[]).return: Boolean indicating whether the sender has the permissions to perform the action.        Always returns false if the app hasn't been initialized yet.

getInitializationBlock().return: Block number in which the contract was initialized

getRecoveryVault().details: Get the recovery vault for the app
getRecoveryVault().return: Recovery vault address for the app

hasInitialized().return: Whether the contract has been initialized by the time of the current block

params._batchBlocks: The number of blocks batches are to last
params._beneficiary: The address of the beneficiary [to whom funds are to be withdrawn]
params._controller: The address of the controller contract
params._maximumTapFloorDecreasePct: The maximum tap floor decrease percentage allowed [in PCT_BASE]
params._maximumTapRateIncreasePct: The maximum tap rate increase percentage allowed [in PCT_BASE]
params._reserve: The address of the reserve [pool] contract

params._token: The address of the token to be un-tapped
The address of the token whose tap timestamps are to be reset
Token balance to be sent to recovery vault.

params._beneficiary: The address of the new beneficiary [to whom funds are to be withdrawn]

params._maximumTapFloorDecreasePct: The new maximum tap floor decrease percentage to be allowed [in PCT_BASE]

params._maximumTapRateIncreasePct: The new maximum tap rate increase percentage to be allowed [in PCT_BASE]

params._token: The address of the token whose tapped amount is to be updated

params._floor: The new floor above which the reserve [pool] balance for that token is to be kept [in wei]
params._rate: The new rate at which that token is to be tapped [in wei / block]
params._token: The address of the token whose tap is to be updated
The address of the token to be transfered

addTappedToken(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Add tap for `_token.symbol(): string` with a rate of `@tokenAmount(_token, _rate)` per block and a floor of `@tokenAmount(_token, _floor)`

transferToVault(address).notice: Send funds to recovery Vault. This contract should never receive funds,        but in case it does, this function allows one to recover them.

updateMaximumTapFloorDecreasePct(uint256.notice: Update maximum tap floor decrease percentage to `@formatPct(_maximumTapFloorDecreasePct)`%

updateMaximumTapRateIncreasePct(uint256).notice: Update maximum tap rate increase percentage to `@formatPct(_maximumTapRateIncreasePct)`%

updateTappedToken(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Update tap for `_token.symbol(): string` with a rate of `@tokenAmount(_token, _rate)` per block and a floor of `@tokenAmount(_token, _floor)`

withdraw(address).notice: Transfer about `@tokenAmount(_token, self.getMaximalWithdrawal(_token): uint256)` from `self.reserve()` to `self.beneficiary()`
